channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PA

item.title: Report X-2025020077
item.description:
Report X-2025020077

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-31
  • City: Carlisle
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF Freight
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Todd Rayno, 042 Operations Supervisor, contacted Safety regarding a UN1824 sodium hydroxide solution spill inside the trailer. Todd Rayno stated it appears to have been punctured by the previous terminal. Safety reviewed manifest movement, and the freight arrived at 042 from 106. Todd Rayno advised the spill has dried up on the skid.

item.title: Report X-2025020226
item.description:
Report X-2025020226

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-31
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: REPORTED TO IR 1 WEARING PROPER PPE USED THE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS FOR CORROSIVE LIQUID. BOX WAS ON THE BELT. BOX WAS WET ON TOP CORNER. NO LIQUID ON THE BELT NO NEED FOR ZEP ZORBENT. PLACED THE BOX IN A GREEN PLASTIC DMP BAG. REMOVED IT TO THE DMP CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESING.

item.description:
Report X-2025020228

  • City: BETHLEHEM

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR A LEAKING HAZMAT. ARRIVED AT LEAKER IN PROPER PPE WITH DECISION TREE IN HAND. OBSERVED THE LEAKER THEN FOLLOWED DECISION TREE FOR PROPER CLEAN UP. AFTER CLEAN UP, TAKEN HAZMAT TO DMP FOR FURTHIR PROCEDURE.

item.title: Report E-2025020037
item.description:
Report E-2025020037

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-09
  • City: CARLISLE
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 04:58 EST on 1/9, XPO-BCA contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 1 cup of Isobutanol from a 55-gal metal drum onto the trailer floor. The drum was punctured during loading at XBP. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable cleaning the spill with terminal-issued PPE.

item.title: Report X-2025011300
item.description:
Report X-2025011300

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-04T06:26:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-24
  • City: READING
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Melvin Cusick, 241 Operations Supervisor, contacted Safety regarding a trichloroethylene spill leaking out of the trailer striking the yard entering the street. ES determined the cause of the release was due to a fork lift puncture.
